mapper.sql: linkman.LINKMAN_INFO_ID linkmanInfoId, linkman.LINKMAN_TYPE linkmanType, linkman.LINKMAN_CATE linkmanCate, linkman.LINKMAN_NAME linkmanName, linkman.LINKMAN_ADDR linkmanAddr, linkman.LINKMAN_OFFICE_PHON linkmanOfficePhon, linkman.LINKMAN_MOBILE_PHONE linkmanMobilePhone, linkman.LINKMAN_FAX linkmanFax, linkman.LINKMAN_MAIL linkmanMail, linkman.LINKMAN_CERT_NO linkmanCertNo, linkman.IS_ACTIVE isActive, linkman.IS_DELETED isDeleted, linkman.LINKMAN_MEMO linkmanMemo, linkman.CREATER creater, linkman.CREATE_TIME createTime, linkman.MODIFIER modifier, linkman.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, linkman.LOGIN_NAME loginName, linkman.LOGIN_PWD loginPwd, linkman.IMG_URL imgUrl, linkman.ROOT_ORG_ID rootOrgId

${alias}.LINKMAN_INFO_ID linkmanInfoId, ${alias}.LINKMAN_TYPE linkmanType, ${alias}.LINKMAN_CATE linkmanCate, ${alias}.LINKMAN_NAME linkmanName, ${alias}.LINKMAN_ADDR linkmanAddr, ${alias}.LINKMAN_OFFICE_PHON linkmanOfficePhon, ${alias}.LINKMAN_MOBILE_PHONE linkmanMobilePhone, ${alias}.LINKMAN_FAX linkmanFax, ${alias}.LINKMAN_MAIL linkmanMail, ${alias}.LINKMAN_CERT_NO linkmanCertNo, ${alias}.IS_ACTIVE isActive, ${alias}.IS_DELETED isDeleted, ${alias}.LINKMAN_MEMO linkmanMemo, ${alias}.CREATER creater, ${alias}.CREATE_TIME createTime, ${alias}.MODIFIER modifier, ${alias}.MODIFY_TIME modifyTime, ${alias}.LOGIN_NAME loginName, ${alias}.LOGIN_PWD loginPwd, ${alias}.IMG_URL imgUrl, ${alias}.ROOT_ORG_ID rootOrgId
mapper.select:
select
from AEA_LINKMAN_INFO linkman where LINKMAN_INFO_ID = #{id} AND IS_DELETED = '0'

select
from AEA_LINKMAN_INFO linkman where LINKMAN_INFO_ID IN ( SELECT LINKMAN_INFO_ID FROM aea_hi_applyinst AND APPLYINST_ID = #{applyinstId} ) AND IS_DELETED = '0'

SELECT ali.linkman_name linkmanName,aupl.LINKMAN_TYPE linkmanType,aupl.LINKMAN_INFO_ID linkmanInfoId from aea_unit_proj aup LEFT JOIN aea_unit_proj_linkman aupl ON aup.UNIT_PROJ_ID=aupl.UNIT_PROJ_ID left join aea_linkman_info ali on aupl.linkman_info_id=ali.linkman_info_id where aup.PROJ_INFO_ID=#{projInfoId} and aup.UNIT_INFO_ID=#{unitInfoId}

select
from AEA_LINKMAN_INFO linkman where LINKMAN_INFO_ID IN ( SELECT LINKMAN_INFO_ID FROM AEA_UNIT_LINKMAN WHERE UNIT_INFO_ID = #{unitInfoId} ) AND IS_DELETED = '0'

select
from AEA_LINKMAN_INFO linkman where linkman.IS_DELETED = '0'
AND (linkman.LINKMAN_NAME LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%') or linkman.LINKMAN_CERT_NO LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{keyword}),'%'))
AND linkman.ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId}
order by linkman.CREATE_TIME desc
mapper.insert: insert into AEA_LINKMAN_INFO (LINKMAN_INFO_ID, LINKMAN_TYPE, LINKMAN_CATE, LINKMAN_NAME, LINKMAN_ADDR, LINKMAN_OFFICE_PHON, LINKMAN_MOBILE_PHONE, LINKMAN_FAX, LINKMAN_MAIL, LINKMAN_CERT_NO, IS_ACTIVE, IS_DELETED, LINKMAN_MEMO, CREATER, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER, MODIFY_TIME, LOGIN_NAME, LOGIN_PWD, IMG_URL,ROOT_ORG_ID) values (#{linkmanInfoId}, #{linkmanType}, #{linkmanCate}, #{linkmanName}, #{linkmanAddr}, #{linkmanOfficePhon}, #{linkmanMobilePhone}, #{linkmanFax}, #{linkmanMail}, #{linkmanCertNo}, #{isActive}, #{isDeleted}, #{linkmanMemo}, #{creater}, #{createTime}, #{modifier}, #{modifyTime}, #{loginName}, #{loginPwd}, #{imgUrl},#{rootOrgId})
mapper.update:
update AEA_LINKMAN_INFO
LINKMAN_INFO_ID = #{linkmanInfoId},
LINKMAN_TYPE = #{linkmanType},
LINKMAN_CATE = #{linkmanCate},
LINKMAN_NAME = #{linkmanName},
LINKMAN_ADDR = #{linkmanAddr},
LINKMAN_OFFICE_PHON = #{linkmanOfficePhon},
LINKMAN_MOBILE_PHONE = #{linkmanMobilePhone},
LINKMAN_FAX = #{linkmanFax},
LINKMAN_MAIL = #{linkmanMail},
LINKMAN_CERT_NO = #{linkmanCertNo},
IS_ACTIVE = #{isActive},
IS_DELETED = #{isDeleted},
LINKMAN_MEMO = #{linkmanMemo},
CREATER = #{creater},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime},
MODIFIER = #{modifier},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime},
LOGIN_NAME = #{loginName},
LOGIN_PWD = #{loginPwd},
IMG_URL = #{imgUrl},
ROOT_ORG_ID = #{rootOrgId},
where LINKMAN_INFO_ID = #{linkmanInfoId}

update AEA_LINKMAN_INFO
IS_DELETED = '1'
where LINKMAN_INFO_ID IN
#{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT t.linkmanName, t.serviceName,
WM_CONCAT(ahc.CERTINST_NAME) certinstName
GROUP_CONCAT(ahc.CERTINST_NAME) certinstName
FROM ( SELECT ali.LINKMAN_NAME linkmanName, ali.LINKMAN_INFO_ID linkmanId, aisl.SERVICE_LINKMAN_ID serviceLinkmanId,
WM_CONCAT(ais.SERVICE_NAME) serviceName
GROUP_CONCAT(ais.SERVICE_NAME) serviceName
FROM aea_im_service_linkman aisl LEFT JOIN aea_linkman_info ali ON ali.LINKMAN_INFO_ID = aisl.LINKMAN_INFO_ID LEFT JOIN aea_im_service ais ON aisl.SERVICE_ID = ais.SERVICE_ID WHERE aisl.UNIT_INFO_ID = #{unitInfoId} AND aisl.IS_DELETE = '0' AND aisl.AUDIT_FLAG = '1' AND ali.IS_DELETED = '0'
AND ali.LINKMAN_NAME LIKE concat('%',concat(#{linkmanName},'%'))
GROUP BY aisl.LINKMAN_INFO_ID) t LEFT JOIN aea_bus_certinst abc ON abc.BUS_RECORD_ID = t.serviceLinkmanId AND abc.BUS_TABLE_NAME = 'aea_im_service_linkman' AND abc.PK_NAME = 'SERVICE_LINKMAN_ID' AND abc.IS_DELETE = '0' LEFT JOIN aea_hi_certinst ahc ON ahc.CERTINST_ID = abc.CERTINST_ID GROUP BY t.linkmanId

SELECT ais.SERVICE_ID serviceId, ais.SERVICE_NAME serviceName, ali.LINKMAN_NAME linkmanName, ali.LINKMAN_MOBILE_PHONE linkmanMobilePhone FROM aea_im_client_service aics LEFT JOIN aea_im_unit_service aius ON aius.UNIT_SERVICE_ID = aics.UNIT_SERVICE_ID LEFT JOIN aea_im_service ais ON aius.SERVICE_ID = ais.SERVICE_ID LEFT JOIN aea_unit_linkman aul ON aul.UNIT_LINKMAN_ID = aics.UNIT_LINKMAN_ID LEFT JOIN aea_linkman_info ali ON ali.LINKMAN_INFO_ID = aul.LINKMAN_INFO_ID WHERE aics.IS_DELETED = '0' AND aius.IS_DELETE = '0' AND ais.IS_DELETE = '0' AND ali.IS_DELETED = '0'

select , ,unit.APPLICANT applicant,unit.IDCARD idcard,aul.IS_BIND_ACCOUNT isBindAccount from AEA_LINKMAN_INFO ali left join AEA_UNIT_LINKMAN aul on ali.linkman_info_id = aul.LINKMAN_INFO_ID left join aea_unit_info unit on aul.UNIT_INFO_ID = unit.unit_info_id where ali.LINKMAN_INFO_ID = #{id} and ali.IS_DELETED = '0'
mapper.delete: delete from AEA_UNIT_LINKMAN where UNIT_INFO_ID=#{unitInfoId} AND LINKMAN_INFO_ID=#{linkmanInfoId}
mapper.select:
select
from AEA_LINKMAN_INFO linkman
(linkman.IS_DELETED = '0' or linkman.IS_DELETED is null) and linkman.LINKMAN_INFO_ID not in(select aul.LINKMAN_INFO_ID from AEA_UNIT_LINKMAN aul where aul.UNIT_INFO_ID=#{unitInfoId})
AND linkman.LINKMAN_CERT_NO like concat('%',concat(#{linkmanCertNo},'%'))
AND linkman.LOGIN_NAME like concat('%',concat(#{loginName},'%'))

select
,aul.IS_BIND_ACCOUNT isBindAccount ,aul.IS_ADMINISTRATORS isAdministrators,aul.UNIT_INFO_ID unitInfoId, (SELECT
WM_CONCAT(ais.SERVICE_NAME)
GROUP_CONCAT(ais.SERVICE_NAME)
FROM aea_im_client_service aics, aea_im_unit_service aius, aea_im_service ais WHERE aics.UNIT_SERVICE_ID = aius.UNIT_SERVICE_ID AND aius.SERVICE_ID = ais.SERVICE_ID AND aics.IS_DELETED = '0' AND aics.UNIT_LINKMAN_ID = aul.UNIT_LINKMAN_ID) serviceNames FROM AEA_UNIT_LINKMAN aul left join AEA_LINKMAN_INFO linkman on linkman.LINKMAN_INFO_ID=aul.LINKMAN_INFO_ID where aul.UNIT_INFO_ID =#{unitInfoId} and linkman.IS_DELETED = '0'
and aul.IS_ADMINISTRATORS=#{isAdministrators}
and aul.IS_BIND_ACCOUNT=#{isBindAccount}
and (linkman.LINKMAN_NAME =#{keyword} or linkman.LINKMAN_CERT_NO = #{keyword} or linkman.LOGIN_NAME=#{keyword})

select
,(select ais.service_name from aea_im_service ais where ais.service_id = lm.service_id) serviceName, lm.practise_date practiseDate,lm.service_linkman_id serviceLinkmanId from aea_linkman_info linfo ,aea_im_service_linkman lm where lm.service_id=#{serviceId} and lm.unit_info_id=#{unitInfoId} and lm.linkman_info_id = linfo.LINKMAN_INFO_ID and lm.audit_flag = '1' and lm.is_delete = '0' and linfo.is_deleted = '0'

SELECT ais.SERVICE_NAME serviceName, aisl.LINKMAN_INFO_ID linkmanInfoId FROM aea_im_service_linkman aisl,aea_im_service ais WHERE aisl.SERVICE_ID = ais.SERVICE_ID AND aisl.LINKMAN_INFO_ID in
#{id}
